description:
BeakerX is a collection of kernels and extensions to Jupyter. It has:

#. extensive JVM kernel support
#. interactive widgets for plots, tables, and forms (with Java, Python, and JS APIs),
#. autotranslation for polyglot programming
#. One-click publication and
#. a data browser with drag-and-drop.

We will demo BeakerX and discuss its history and relationship to its predecessor the Beaker Not
title: BeakerX Beaker Extensions for Jupyter
